content.rendered:
MEGHAN MARKLE’S FAVORITE MAKEUP

With a little bit of research, I found Meghan Markle’s favorite makeup products that she loves and uses on a daily basis. Did you watch the Roal Wedding? I got up at 4am to watch it! I know so many people around the world have the Roal Wedding fever like I do. Meghan looked fresh, classic, and absolutely radiant on her Wedding Day. It was so refreshing to see minimal makeup so that her natural beauty with freckles shine through.

The main focus was on Meghan’s eyes with beautiful fluttery lashes. Keeping makeup to a minimum and just focus on having beautiful lashes. It’s the best recommendation I can make for Wedding Days. You don’t want heavy makeup that will cake up during such a long day of celebration. To save you even more time I recommend getting professional lash extensions half a week before the big day.

Here are the top three reasons to book lash extensions appointment with D’Lashes today!

I was a pioneer in the industry! Did you know I was one of the first ladies to have lash extensions? I used to put lashes on myself before I would go on modeling auditions. I would cut up lash stripes and apply the individual lashes to my own lashes for a more natural look. Before I knew it everyone was wanting to get their lashes done by me.

Time Saver. D’Lashes save time. No matter what you are doing you are always going to be looking fabulash. When you are rushing around in the morning to get out the door, you will no longer have to worry about putting mascara on.

Easy Maintenance. After your first appointment, you will just need to get a fill-in every two weeks. You will never have to worry about your lashes not looking perfect again. The only disadvantage is D’Lashes are addictive. The most addictive thing is knowing you are always looking fabulash. It is such a boost to know that your eyes are always on point. So what are you waiting for!? Lash out with us today!

SHOP

Shop Meghan Markle’s Makeup here 1 Laura Mercier Radiance Foundation Primer. 2 Add some D’Lashes extensions or D’Lashes famous D’Wispy removable lashes here. 3 Brighten the undereye area. Meghan’s must-have is the YSL Touche Eclat Radiant Touch concealer. 4 Meghan’s favorite Charlotte Tilbury Lipstick in Very Victoria  5 Meghan Markle’s favorite Mac Eyeliner in Teddy  6 Her top foundation is Chanel Sublimage Le Teint 7 Relax on the big day with D’Lashes candles and relaxing music.

LOVE DIONNE
